Sentencas: Metallic interconnects have been becoming an increasingly interesting topic in the development in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Clad metals, roll bonding and their applications for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: High temperature oxidation resistant alloys are currently considered as candidate materials.
Titulo: Clad metals, roll bonding and their applications for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Among these alloys however, different groups of alloys demonstrate different advantages and disadvantages, and few if any can completely satisfy the stringent requirements for the application.
Titulo: Clad metals, roll bonding and their applications for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: To integrate the advantages and avoid the disadvantages of different groups of alloys, clad metal has been proposed for SOFC interconnect applications and interconnect structures.
Titulo: Clad metals, roll bonding and their applications for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: This paper gives a brief overview of the cladding approach and its applications, and discuss the viability of this technology to fabricate the metallic layered-structure interconnects.
Titulo: Clad metals, roll bonding and their applications for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: To examine the feasibility of this approach, the austenitic Ni-base alloy Haynes 230 and the ferritic stainless steel AL 453 were selected as examples and manufactured into a clad metal.
Titulo: Clad metals, roll bonding and their applications for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Its suitability as an interconnect construction material was investigated.
Titulo: Clad metals, roll bonding and their applications for SOFC interconnects
